ValidationRule.description: Sales Reps populate Primary Comp Level 2 field when stage is 'Not Sold' or at or above 50% prob, and before the rep marks it as Sold (80% prob)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( $User.Job_Name__c = 'Sales Representative', $Profile.Name = 'MMS SDR'),
$User.Sales_Division__c != 'Virtual TAA', ISCHANGED(StageName), NOT(BEGINS(PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Sold')), ISBLANK(TEXT(Primary_Competition_Level_2__c)),
OR( AND( OR(AND(Probability >= 0.50, Probability <= 0.80), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Lost')),
OR($RecordType.Name = 'MMS Opportunity (DSA) Record Type' ,$RecordType.Name = 'MMS Opportunity Record Type') ),
AND( OR(Probability = 0.80, ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Lost')),
OR($RecordType.Name = 'MMS Opportunity (DSA) Record Type' ,$RecordType.Name = 'MMS Opportunity Record Type') ) ),
NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Administrator')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must complete the Primary Competition Level 2 field before saving this Opportunity to a higher Status or to Lost.
